channel.title: Blog on Whitehall And Daingean Road Residents Association
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Whitehall And Daingean Road Residents Association

item.title: AED
item.description: There is a defibrillator located behind the wall at 81 This will need to be replaced as the current defibrillator has become unusable Link to aed location map/app for Ireland This is community driven, our aed has not been added Link to aed location map/app worldwide Our aed has been added, Android + iPhone apps avaialble also

item.title: Tidy Tullamore
item.description: List of previous finishing positions for Tidy Tullamore 2010 Most improved Estate 2011 1st place in Large estate 2012 1st place in Large estate 2013 Overall Winners 2014 2nd place in Large estates 2015 Overall Winners 2016 Overall Winners 2017 Excellence Award

item.title: Fairy Door Map
item.description: Here is a draft of the location of the Fairy doors located in the estate This is just a draft, if we have any artists in the area, any help to improve would be appreciated! Fairy Door Map PDF

item.title: Santa
item.description: With Christmas fast approaching, We have a resident Santa visit the children on Christmas Eve, with each child receiving either a: Selection Box Soft Toy

item.title: Tullamore Flood Defence Scheme
item.description: Details about the Tullamore Flood Defence Scheme Link to gov site Tullamore Flood Defence Scheme gov.ie PDF
